data.title: Steve Carell
data.meta_description: #87 Steve Carell on the 2011 Celebrity 100 - This is Carell's last year on our list in the TV category. With his stint on The Office ending, he now needs
data.text:
Who Killed Steve ‘Air’ McNair? Netflix Doc Delves Into Chilling Murder Of NFL Football Star

Netflix’s new “Untold" documentary focuses on the shocking murder of NFL MVP Steve "Air" McNair. What happened to the football star, and who killed him?

Paralympic Wheelchair Basketball Star Steve Serio Emphasizes Fun Over Pressure

Wheelchair basketball legend Steve Serio is looking forward to the Paralympics but feels that sport needs to be focused on fun to get more disabled people to participate.

One On One Recording Studio Is A True Hidden Gem In Los Angeles

Nestled in the heart of North Hollywood is one of the best recording studios in LA. A true hidden gem, where Metallica and Etta James have recoded, One On One is a find.

Steve Ross To Celebrate Lyricist Alan Jay Lerner At Birdland Jazz Club

Pianist and singer Steve Ross will celebrate the legendary lyricist Alan Jay Lerner at Birdland Jazz Club in New York this week.

This Steve Wozniak Cofounded Startup Aims To Be A One-Stop Shop For Space-Based Data

Privateer, cofounded by Apple and NASA vets, wants to make satellite data as ubiquitous as GPS with a platform providing insight on disasters, logistics and even pirates.

Mike Einziger Of Incubus On Revisiting ‘Morning View,’ Steve Vai’s Pipa

Incubus guitarist Mike Einziger on revisiting the group's most commercially successful album via the new 'Morning View XXIII' collection and performing it in full on tour

Why Did Steve Martin Turn Down Playing Tim Walz On ‘Saturday Night Live?’

Steve Martin officially declined the role of Tim Walz on "Saturday Night Live" this fall. Here’s why the actor and veteran host chose not to take on the 2024 election gig.

Gavin Rossdale On New Bush Greatest Hits Set, Learning From Steve Albini

Gavin Rossdale of 90s alt stalwarts Bush on working with Steve Albini and a new Bush greatest hits album/tour, one which also features Candlebox and Jerry Cantrell.

Apple Loop: New iPhone 16 Leaks, Steve Jobs’ Polaroids, Faster iPhone 16 Pro Revealed

This week’s Apple headlines; Apple’s Q3 earnings call, new iPhone 16 Pro details, Apple Intelligence arrives, iPhone’s speedy upgrade, MacBook Pro monitors, Steve Jobs polaroids, and more...

‘Despicable Me 4’ Gets Digital Streaming Premiere Date

"Despicable Me 4"—an animated smash featuring Steve Carell’s Gru and the Minions—is coming soon to digital streaming. Click in to see when and where you can see it.

Storms Shorten Sets As Def Leppard, Journey, Steve Miller Band Hit Chicago

An early start and abbreviated sets allowed "Stadium Tour" performers Def Leppard, Journey and Steve Miller Band to take the stage Monday night in Chicago prior to storms

Inside The Steve Van Zandt Documentary That The Rocker Didn’t Want To Make

The new documentary Stevie Van Zandt: Disciple took well over a decade to make—largely because the rocker himself didn't want to be involved.

Team USA’s New Era Under Steve Kerr: Continuing The Legacy

Explore how Olympic Team USA Basketball is entering a new era under coach Steve Kerr. Learn how he plans to continue the legacy and drive the team to new heights.

Does ‘Despicable Me 4’ Have An End Credits Scene?

Gru and the Minions are back with “Despicable Me 4,” starring the voice of Steve Carell. Is there an end credits scene to indicate more “Despicable” adventures are on the way?

Ronaldo’s $105 Million Year Tops Messi And Crowns Him Soccer’s First Billion-Dollar Man

Soccer’s two biggest names have been dueling for a decade over who’s the best—and highest-paid—in the sport. The battle is far from finished.
